presentation.intro-content: I'm currently doing projects in order to enhance the technologies that I've been learning (HTML, CSS and JS) and I'm looking for my first work experience!

project-1.title: Simplified budget
project-1.description: App that enables you to manage your expenses

project-2.title: Password Generator
project-2.description: App that enables you to generate new passwords. Besides, you can custom it checking and unchecking some options.

project-3.title: Weather App
project-3.description: Basically, it is a weather app where you can check the weather and forecast of your city or other cities in realtime.

project-4.title: World cup 2022 predictor
project-4.description: This game is about choosing your favorite teams from the initial phases to the final. Also, there is another page where you can check the status of every game in real time.

project-5.title: Crypto Project
project-5.description: List of the 25 cryptos by market cap. And also the price of some cryptos in three FIAT currencies. (CoinGecko API)

project-6.title: Pizza shops templates
project-6.description: The realization of these landing pages allowed me to improve my skills in HTML and CSS.

footer.text: In case you need more information:
